data.prayer: Jesus, teach the local leaders in Nilphamari, Rangpur, Bangladesh to be humble and to serve others.
data.verse: It shall not be so among you. But whoever would be great among you must be your servant, and whoever would be first among you must be your slave, even as the Son of Man came not to be served but to serve, and to give his life as a ransom for many.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Nilphamari, Rangpur, Bangladesh
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Father, please remove the barriers that keep the 1,826,400 who are far from you in Nilphamari, Rangpur, Bangladesh from having access to a Bible.
data.verse: And this gospel of the kingdom will be preached in the whole world as a testimony to all nations, and then the end will come.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 798 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Spirit, give the disciples of the the county of Nilphamari words, actions, signs and wonders to proclaim the coming of the Kingdom.
data.verse: As you go, proclaim this message: "The kingdom of heaven has come near."

data.prayer: Spirit, guide every search on Google for truth in Nilphamari, Rangpur, Bangladesh to find a gospel video.
data.verse: you will seek Me and find Me when you search for Me with all your heart.

data.prayer: Father, open to your people a door for the word, to speak the mystery of Christ to the Rajput (Hindu traditions) people.
Jesus, strengthen the church in Nilphamari, Rangpur, Bangladesh by giving a prophet, as you said you would, who is bold and willing to correct. Lord, may the believers care about holiness as you do.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Spirit, help every believer in Nilphamari, Rangpur, Bangladesh be prepared to give an answer to everyone who asks them for the reason for their hope.
data.verse: But in your hearts revere Christ as Lord. Always be prepared to give an answer to everyone who asks you to give the reason for the hope that you have. But do this with gentleness and respect.

data.prayer: Spirit, help the disciples in the county of Nilphamari to find a person of peace today, like the Philippian jailer, who heard and was immediately baptized with his whole family.
data.verse: And they spoke the word of the Lord to him and to all who were in his house. And he took them the same hour of the night and washed their wounds; and he was baptized at once, he and all his family.
